title: CEP-KAS: Chirality Echo Protocol 3D Cyclic Simulation
description: A 3D numerical simulation deriving galaxy spin parameter λ = 0.0482 from a single topological chirality bias Δχ = 10⁻⁸ in the pre-geometric vacuum. Includes preprint, Python/NumPy code, and full appendices. Compatible with ΛCDM and cyclic cosmology.

creators.name: Valamontes, Antonios
creators.affiliation: Kapodistrian Academy of Science (KAS), Tampa, Florida, USA
